jd: From: Anamika, RCI aanamika@rconsultinginc.com Reply to: aanamika@rconsultinginc.com Role: Full Stack .NET Engineer Location: 100% Remote Duration: 5 months Visa - ALL Rate: $45/hr C2C (MAX) See what you can find this is a straight contract role. We are seeking a hands-on Full Stack Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience in .NET, C#, and React. Responsibilities:·We need someone with full stack dev exp. React/C#.·Personality will be important. Need someone driven, needs to rollup their sleeves and learn.·Type of Projects: POCs, new features of an existing platform. Will be a part of requirements gathering with the business, Learning what system does, how it's designed and build of something new.·Why TMS: Fully remote. Great home work integration. you'll be working on POCs and other new ideas to take to their customer.·For submission- Candidates must be able to give examples of what they did. Should be able to speak to the business purpose of the project they were on, not just talk about the technologies they used.·Design, develop, and maintain scalable, high-performance applications using .NET, C#, and React·Design and implementation of new features and products·Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and implement new features.·Stay current with emerging technologies and industry trends·Plan and execute data migration projects, ensuring data integrity and minimal downtime Requirements:· 5+ years of experience in software development· Proficiency in .NET framework and C# programming· Experience with React and modern front-end development practices· Familiarity with Agile development methodologies· Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills· Strong communication and leadership abilities Preferred Skills:· Experience with Azure Cloud services and DevOps practices· Knowledge of AI and machine learning concepts and their practical applications in business· Proven experience in planning and executing complex data migration projects
